attributes.action: act to invoke 2 hour limited waiting restrictions to the lay-bys on the A65 adjacent to Jcn 36 of the M6 motorway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned call for the Highways Authority to implement 2hr daytime waiting restrictions in the three lay-bys on the A65 adjacent to junction 36 of the M6 Motorway. 
The purpose of a lay-by being a resting place, not a designated car park.  
Basically, we want the Local Authority to sit up and take action to protect the verges and safeguard the future of local businesses.

Please sign our petition to show your support.
